channel.title: Stop people selling rares to a shop
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone knew how to stop people selling certain items to a shop. Lets say I didn't want people to be able to sell a "Red Partyhat" to the "I buy anything man", how would I do that? (I still want the "I buy anything man" to buy other items, just not that one)
PI Base. If it's anything to you, it's part FormationX (I've done a lot to it ;D!)

item.title: Stop people selling rares to a shop
item.dc:creator: @RsMakerWoad RsMakerWoad
item.description:
@RsMakerWoad wrote:

I’m pretty sure you can go in config.java and put the items in the items that can’t be sold area…

^ exactly what he said,Thats how u do it
Btw go to www.itemdb.biz
Search for the code
put it into config
GF
GL

Read full topic
item.source: Stop people selling rares to a shop

item.title: Stop people selling rares to a shop
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Make an array of not allowed ids and make a check for it in shophandler
